description: a sturdy and sizable cardboard box, neatly stamped with branded manufacturer’s markings, lines of printed information, and contact details for a service that likely stopped existing along with its customers.  The stylized image of a long-barrelled rifle adorns the container’s front, with large text promising the inclusion of all the parts required to convert a specific weapon to fire one of a number of possible cartridges; a compatible magazine is also included.

The stylized image of an assembled rifle adorns the container’s front, with large text promising the inclusion of all the parts required to convert a specific weapon to fire one of a number of possible cartridges; a compatible magazine is also included.

a modestly sized cardboard box, neatly stamped with branded manufacturer’s markings, lines of printed information, and contact details for a service that likely stopped existing along with its customers.  The stylized image of an assembled carbine adorns the container’s front, with large text promising the inclusion of all the parts required to convert a specific weapon to fire one of a number of possible cartridges; a compatible magazine is also included.

a relatively small cardboard box, neatly stamped with branded manufacturer’s markings, lines of printed information, and contact details for a service that likely stopped existing along with its customers.  The stylized image of an extremely shortened carbine adorns the container’s front, with large text promising the inclusion of all the parts required to convert a specific weapon to fire one of a number of possible cartridges; a compatible magazine is also included.
